refnamediv.refpurpose: Search a string for any of a set of characters

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: strpbrk searches the haystack string for a char_list, and returns a string starting from the character found (or &false; if it is not found).

note.para: The char_list parameter is case sensitive.

example.title: strpbrk example
example.programlisting:
<?php

$text = 'This is a Simple text.';

// this echoes "is is a Simple text." because 'i' is matched first
echo strpbrk($text, 'mi');

// this echoes "Simple text." because chars are case sensitive
echo strpbrk($text, 'S');
?>
